channel.title: Dickson Neoh - Personal Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Dickson Neoh - Personal Portfolio

item.title: Counting microalgaes with MicroSense
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Training Hosting Deploying on Android Introduction Microbiologist count cells manually. This process can be tedious and prone to mistakes. Why not automate the counting using a trained deep learning model? This blog post showcases MicroSense, a proof of concept product that can automate the counting of microalgae cells or any cells for that matter using deep learning and computer vision.

item.title: Deploy IceVision Models on HuggingFace Spaces
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Icevision Gradio HuggingFace Spaces Introduction So, youâ€™ve trained a deep learning model that can detect objects from images. Next, how can you share the awesomeness of your model with the rest of the world? You might be a PhD student trying to get some ideas from your peers or supervisors, or a startup founder who wishes to share a minimum viable product to your clients for feedback.
